title: WINDOWS HPC SERVER 2008 SP1 X64 (updated to dec.08, iso=1,2gb)
description:
WINDOWS HPC SERVER 2008 SP1 X64 (updated to dec.08) (vlited to 1.2gb iso size) (750mb portable apps) (90mb einer der besten mixe)




I JUST added my favorite portable apps (some u can start from the desktop, others from the startmenu AND A PICTURE VIEWER (INFRAN) 
-BECAUSE THERE IS NO DEFAULT PICTURE VIEWER IN THIS HPC SERVER-. 

u will find a file "todo" in the iso. dobble klick and a folder will appear on your desktop after 4min extraction (maybe u refresh the desktop). 
20 portable apps!!! 750mb!! einer der besten mixe!!

vlited: all drivers (instead storrage) all languages (instead english)
hardware support printer! and a little bit more! still conains firewall and ie.

I RECOMMEND EVERYBODY to use AS MUCH PORTABLE APPS (WITHOUT INSTALL) AS POSSIBLE to keep your registry clean and the system fast.

apply the crack or just rearm 3times (120 days).

i am not sure about this: 
***if you want to rearm more than 3times, make a reg file with this:

    Windows Registry Editor Version 5.00

    [HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINESOFTWAREMicrosoftWindows NTCurrentVersionSL]
    "SkipRearm"=dword:00000001 
****

in case it askes for a cd key use YQGMW-MPWTJ-34KDK-48M3W-X4Q6V.

in this version you will not be able to install desktop experience and aero theme!!!! there is no wmp!!!! 

its the fastest server08 -workstation- out there.
to run 99% of apps and games put these services to automatic and the rest to manual!!! works perfect for me.
com+event system

themes

(this is if u use wireless!)


any problems - install vb, netfrm and java runtimes.

bye
